00033 /* 
00034    To disable the shell, following two things must be done. 
00035    1) Uncomment the following code line (#define ENABLE_SHELL_EN)
00036    2) In shell.c, on top of the file, #if should be set 0. 
00037 
00038    To Enable the shell, following two things must be done. 
00039    1) Comment the following code line (#define ENABLE_SHELL_EN)
00040    2) In shell.c, on top of the file, #if should be set 1.   
00041 */
00042 //#define ENABLE_SHELL_EN   /* Enable (1) or Disable (0) argument checking  */
00043 #define MAX_SHELL_TASKS      2
00044 #define MAX_SHELL_SEMPS      2
00045 #define MAX_SHELL_MUTEXS     2
00046 #define MAX_SHELL_FLAGGRPS   2
00047 #define MAX_SHELL_MAILBOXS   2
00048 #define MAX_SHELL_QUEUES     2
00049 #define MAX_SHELL_MEMPARTS   1
